metadata.subject: Mueller drew up obstruction indictment against Trump, Michael Wolff book claims

relationships.description: Kahn is sending Epstein a news article about political developments

analysis.purpose: To share news about political developments involving Mueller and Trump
analysis.significance: Shows communication about high-profile political matters between Kahn and Epstein

blackmail_indicators.description: No indicators of blackmail or coercion present - appears to be routine sharing of news article

illegal_activity.description: Document is sharing a news article about political developments, not discussing first-hand illegal activity

details: Reference to Michael Wolff book and The Guardian article about Mueller investigation and Trump

public_knowledge.context: Michael Wolff's books about the Trump administration were widely publicized and discussed in media

analysis.summary: Richard Kahn emails Jeffrey Epstein a news article from The Guardian about Michael Wolff's book claiming that Mueller had drawn up an obstruction indictment against Trump, marked as high importance.
